test_name: Invite Teacher Modal and Invitation Link Generation
description: Verify that school managers can successfully invite teachers using the invitation modal and generate invitation links
Verify that school managers can add themselves as teachers through the teacher onboarding form

test_name: Add Student Profile Modal and Registration
description: Verify that school managers can successfully add new student profiles through the add student modal

test_name: Add me as teacher Button Visibility Logic
description: Verify that the "Add me as teacher" button displays correctly based on user's existing teacher profile status
Verify that the enhanced student creation modal provides comprehensive user feedback including loading states and success notifications
Verify that a new teacher can successfully register on a school using the teacher onboarding process
